Name: Destinata RED
About the game: Destinata FULL RED Edition is the finally long waited version of Destinata Red, implosioning from 'colors'! The moon is falling, its shredded pieces are approaching menacingly towards us and there is only one path towards, Take down the enemy targets, and fight them until death. Destinata Full Red edition contains: cute Pixel Art and Characters! Hand made animations and unique 2d indie pixel art metroidvania art stlye! Different branches and elections throughout the game! Hand drew HD full 4k images (sometimes pixeled due to system necessities)! A false and grotesque sensation of thinking about a future with happiness that will never be reached not matter any decision, constrained by destiny we will not escape. weird People! And Most Importantly..........
